itSA <- c(seq(0, 50));
tempSA <- c(1.0,0.49,0.32000000000000006,0.23499999999999988,0.18399999999999994,0.1499999999999999,0.12571428571428567,0.10749999999999993,0.09333333333333327,0.08200000000000007,0.07272727272727275,0.06499999999999995,0.05846153846153834,0.052857142857142936,0.04800000000000004,0.043749999999999956,0.040000000000000036,0.036666666666666625,0.03368421052631576,0.030999999999999917,0.02857142857142847,0.026363636363636367,0.024347826086956514,0.022499999999999964,0.02079999999999993,0.019230769230769162,0.01777777777777767,0.01642857142857146,0.015172413793103523,0.014000000000000012,0.012903225806451646,0.01187500000000008,0.01090909090909098,0.010000000000000009,0.00914285714285712,0.008333333333333304,0.00756756756756749,0.006842105263157983,0.006153846153846176,0.00550000000000006,0.004878048780487809,0.004285714285714226,0.0037209302325580396,0.0031818181818181746,0.002666666666666595,0.0021739130434781373,0.0017021276595745594,0.0012499999999999734,8.163265306122547E-4,3.9999999999995595E-4,0.0);

pdf("../Desktop/SA_Temp.pdf");
plot(tempSA ~ itSA, type='l', col='blue', xlab='Iterations', ylab='Temperature', ylim=c(0,1),  main='SA temperature curve');
dev.off();
